class.name: SpineIkConstraintData
class.brief_description: Stores the setup pose for an [code]SpineIkConstraint[/code].
class.description: Stores the setup pose for an [code]SpineIkConstraint[/code]. See [url]http://esotericsoftware.com/spine-ik-constraints[/url] in the Spine User Guide.

method.name: get_bend_direction
method.description: For two bone IK, controls the bend direction of the IK bones, either 1 or -1.

method.name: get_bones
method.description: The bones that are constrained by this IK constraint.

method.name: get_compress
method.description: For one bone IK, when true and the target is too close, the bone is scaled to reach it.

method.name: get_mix
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained rotation. For two bone IK: if the parent bone has local nonuniform scale, the child bone's local Y translation is set to 0.

method.name: get_softness
method.description: For two bone IK, the target bone's distance from the maximum reach of the bones where rotation begins to slow. The bones will not straighten completely until the target is this far out of range.

method.name: get_stretch
method.description: When true and the target is out of range, the parent bone is scaled to reach it. For two bone IK: 1) the child bone's local Y translation is set to 0, 2) stretch is not applied if softness is > 0, and 3) if the parent bone has local nonuniform scale, stretch is not applied.

method.name: get_target
method.description: The bone that is the IK target.

method.name: get_uniform
method.description: When true and compress or stretch is used, the bone is scaled on both the X and Y axes.
